altername_name: Tout Savoir CM2: L'Essentiel du Programme
name: Tout Savoir CM2
overview: No more vacation notebooks!Make way for vacation cartridges!This version of knowledge offers to revise CM1 and CM2 programs in the form of MCQ for French, math, history, geography, science and English.A statistical tool makes it possible to follow the child's progression in each subject and thus see its possible weak points to improve.
